name: The Veiled World
description:
Can YOU help defend the kingdom from the horrors that await in THE VEILED WORLD? Will YOU be able to do it without killing any gnomes? The answers are YES and MAYBE.

The Veiled World is a short platformer/shooter with light jumping puzzles involving the ability to switch between two worlds at will. There are four playable characters with different weapons and play styles and an unlockable arena mode.

Payment isn't expected but if you want to throw a few pennies into my cap then I will be very grateful.
